bio.p: Jennyfer Ambe is an Epidemiologist with a keen interest in bioethics engaged at both country and community levels with COVID‐19 task force duties. She is a member of the Ethics Working Group for the COVID‐19 Coalition. She works with SAMOCRI, to support Community Health in NE Nigeria. Jennyfer is also a member of ECEPAS working group and the International Coordinator for the GET Consortium.
